overview: Neil Kadisha is primarily responsible for providing management expertise and strategic planning for Omninet companies. He is also involved in seeking synergistic investment opportunities and offering industry insights for the evaluation of potential investments. Prior to Omninet, Neil founded and served as the CEO of numerous high-tech manufacturing companies. For over 15 years, Neil served on the Board of Directors of Qualcomm. He also serves on the Boards of various privately held companies. Neil’s academic background is in Industrial Management and Economics.
